snippet: The United Nations and rights groups said thousands are stuck at a holding area in crowded and unacceptable conditions in Jordan’s northeast.
abstract: United Nations and human rights groups urge Jordan to take in thousands of Syrian refugees stuck in desert holding area along Syrian border.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations and rights groups said thousands are stuck at a holding area in crowded and unacceptable conditions in Jordan’s northeast.

headline.main: Jordan Is Asked to Admit Thousands of Stranded Syrians
headline.print_headline: Rising Pleas to Let Syrians in Tent Camp Enter Jordan

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
